vectors.command: deno task --quiet --cwd=./25519 write; deno task --quiet --cwd=./aead write; deno task --quiet --cwd=./base write; deno task --quiet --cwd=./csv write; deno task --quiet --cwd=./hash write; deno task --quiet --cwd=./text write;

tasks.cover: deno task --quiet --cwd=. record && deno task --quiet --cwd=. report

exports.description: Outputs a list of entrypoints and their respective paths. Requires jq.
exports.command: cd "$INIT_CWD" || exit 1; jq -r 'if (.exports | type) == "object" then .exports | to_entries[] | "\(.key) \(.value)" else ". \(.exports)" end' ./deno.json

pure.description: Checks for side-effects, which would be included in the generated output. Requires bash and jq.
pure.command: cd "$INIT_CWD" || exit 1; bash -c 'deno task --quiet --cwd=. exports | while read line; do echo "# $(cut -d" " -f1 <<<"$line")"; echo "import \"$(cut -d" " -f2 <<<"$line")\";" >bundle.ts && deno bundle --quiet --unstable-raw-imports bundle.ts; rm -f bundle.ts; echo; done'

tasks.ok: cd "$INIT_CWD" || exit 1; deno task --cwd=. check; deno task --cwd=. lint; deno task --cwd=. cover; deno task --cwd=. pure; deno publish --dry-run --allow-dirty
tasks.size: cd "$INIT_CWD" || exit 1; (deno bundle --quiet --unstable-raw-imports --minify /dev/stdin | brotli | wc --bytes | awk '{ printf "%.1fkb\n", $1/1000; }') <

mini.description: Bundles, minifies, and calculates the brotli'd size. Requires bash, jq, brotli, wc, and awk.
mini.command: cd "$INIT_CWD" || exit 1; bash -c 'deno task --quiet --cwd=. exports | while read line; do echo "$(deno task --quiet --cwd=. size "$(cut -d" " -f2 <<<"$line")") $(cut -d" " -f1 <<<"$line")"; done'

tasks.publish: cd "$INIT_CWD" || exit 1; deno publish --allow-dirty; cd npm && npm publish --access=public && cd .. && rm -r npm;
